original_title: Two including a Russian national. dead in a motor accident in Ududumbara
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Two people, including a Russian national, died in a motor accident that took place in Meemure in Ududumbara.
West African regional bloc ECOWAS prepares for military intervention to restore democracy in Niger – Sets seven-day deadline
Suicide bombing at political rally in northwest Pakistan kills 44 and wounds 130
